General.Name: PT Wahana Interfood Nusantara Tbk
General.Description: PT Wahana Interfood Nusantara Tbk manufactures and sells cocoa and chocolate products in Indonesia. It provides cocoa powder, couverture chocolates, compound chocolates, spreads and fillings, and chocolate powder drinks. The company sells its products under the SCHOKO brand for food manufacturers, food services, and retailers. It also exports its products to Asia, Europe, Australia, New Zealand, and the United States. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Bandung, Indonesia.
